Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in getLoc: 6
sub getLoc {
    my $lang = shift;
    loc_lang($lang);
    
    return \&loc;
}
public method WeBWorK::Localize::negquant (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in negquant: 11
sub negquant {
    my($handle, $num, @forms) = @_;

    return $num if @forms == 0;

    my $negcase = shift @forms;
    return $negcase if $num < 0;

    return $forms[2] if @forms > 2 and $num == 0; 
    return( $handle->numf($num) . ' ' . $handle->numerate($num, @forms) );
}
public method WeBWorK::Localize::plural (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in plural: 9
sub plural {
    my($handle, $num, @forms) = @_;

    return "" if @forms == 0;  
    return $forms[2] if @forms > 2 and $num == 0; 

    # Normal case:
    return(  $handle->numerate($num, @forms) );
}
